items.title: How Trump justifies his tariffs -- from budget balancing to protecting 'the soul' of America
items.description: To President Donald Trump, "tariff" is more than "the most beautiful word in the dictionary," something he says often.

items.title: Trump moves House GOP holdouts closer to supporting government funding extension
